Rulings.Base:
1. If "Jurrac Velphito" is flipped face-down, its ATK and DEF become 0 and will remain 0 even when it is flipped face-up again.
2. You use the values printed on the Synchro Material Monsters when determining this card's ATK and DEF. If you use "Tyranno Infinity", its ATK is considered 0.
3. If "Shrink" is used on "Jurrac Velphito", its ATK will be 0 and will remain 0 even after the effect "Shrink" ends.
4. If the effect of "Sea Koala" is used on "Jurrac Velphito", its ATK will be 0 and will remain 0 even after the effect ends.

PSCT.Base:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner Dinosaur-Type monsters
This card's ATK and DEF are equal to the total original ATK of the Synchro Material Monsters used for its Synchro Summon. If this card attacks a face-down Defense Position monster, you can destroy the monster immediately with this card's effect without flipping it face-up or applying damage calculation.
